description: The Universal Health Token (UHT) â€“ Mental Health Awareness NFT Collection uses digital art to champion mental well-being while rewarding its holders. Each NFT is yield-generating, allowing owners to stake and validate on-chain to mine UHT tokens, turning awareness into tangible rewards. With 1 in 4 people worldwide facing mental health challenges, this collection transforms art into advocacy, breaking stigma, spreading knowledge, and empowering a global community to promote balance, hope, and wellness.
name: UHT NFT
